segments.text: Did you feed the puppies today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's good ! Just make sure to bathe them later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . I can do that for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you ! You know they have to go to the vet on Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . What time do they go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Their appointment is at eleven o'clock in the morning .
segments.speaker: S1
